parameters: You are princess Snow of the Lotus Monarchy.
The Lotus Monarchy has ruled Lucredia for as long as you lived.
As you stare at the unstable portal to Ouranos, you reflect
on just who you really are.
Your deeds across Lucredia has earned you the title of
'hero'. Even though those deeds felt more like cleaning up
You have learned Weapon Transformation: Arming Sword
You were the Lotus crowned princess, but life happened and
you had to settle for being Queen of the mountaneer kingdom.
Still not bad considering your elder sister heeds your word.
You have learned Weapon Transformation: Greatsword
You were destined for greatness, but family biases and bitterness
casted you to the shadows, but in those shadows you flourished.
You foiled countless assasination attempts, most unspoken.
You have learned Weapon Transformation: Daggers
You despised nobilic life and lived as a wanderer. Yet no
matter where you went, people knew your name and your uncanny
ability to deal with any threat.
You have learned Weapon Transformation: Spear
All either loved you or hated you, there was zero inbetween.
Maybe thats because your fists made them make up their minds
You have learned Weapon Transformation: Gauntlets
Your deeds across Lucredia has earned you the title of
'hero'. Even though those deeds felt more like cleaning up

You have learned Weapon Transformation: Gauntlets
Your Mother's blade 'Icebreaker', had chosen you to be its
wielder since you were a child. Its unique ability to shapeshift
was something no other frost weapon was capable of.
To you, it was more than a weapon. Icebreaker had been your
best friend since your first adventure in Ouranos over a decade
You already have Arming Sword unlocked.

No matter what life you lived, there was something nobody
could take away from you; your love for dance.
Over the years, this flowery talent had unfurled from the
confines of social gatherings and blossomed admist violent combat.
and your signature became know as...
The rose that bloomed in blood.
The rose that sped with the wind.
The rose that shrouded itself in darkness.
The rose that embraced the night.

You are princess Snow of the Lotus Monarchy.
The Lotus Monarchy has ruled Lucredia for as long as you lived.
As you stare at the unstable portal to Ouranos, you reflect
on just who you really are.
Your deeds across Lucredia had earned you the title of
'hero'. Even though those deeds felt more like cleaning up
You have learned Weapon Transformation: \c[18]Arming Sword\c[18]
You had became the new Lotus crowned princess, but due to
your overzealous ambitions, you forced the crown back onto
your sister while you sought to control Vulcas.
You were destined for greatness, but family biases and bitterness
casted you to the shadows, but in those shadows you flourished.
You foiled countless assasination attempts, most unseen.
You despised nobilic life and lived as a wanderer. The wilds
and frontier towns became your home. Unfortunately this
lifestyle did not supress your name, it did the opposite.
You were either adored or despised.
Speaking with your fists leaves no room for indiffrence.
Your deeds across Lucredia has earned you the title of
'hero'. Even though those deeds felt more like cleaning up
